title: To all toplaners
body:
STOP TAKING MID LANE CHAMPS IN TOP LANE. IT IS EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING TO FIGHT PEOPLE LIKE ANNIE AND AHRI WHEN YOU ARE A TOP LANER BECAUSE A) YOU PROBABLY DONT HAVE MUCH OF A GAP CLOSER TO GET TO THEM B) YOU DON'T HAVE AS MUCH CC AS THEM AND C) YOU DONT HAVE AS MUCH POKE OR ZONING AS THEM.  AND TO THOSE WHO PLAY ANNIE AND AHRI IN THE TOP LANE. STOP! YOU ARE LITERALLY RUINING THE ENTIRE GAME EXPERIENCE FOR THE TOP LANER AND ITS TIME TO FUCKING STOP! 

-from a top lane main whose seen too much broken shit in my 2 years of playing top

Thing is, if it's not meta, there must be a reason. You cannot win your lane, but you must be able to do something else to win the game, or this would be played in competitive.

Try to survive until team-fights, and then the lack of frontline of the enemy team should cost them a lot.

being starved of farm because they can zone you hard doesn't help that much and when ur team is also falling behind they cant do much either, my mid and jg tried to fight an annie which had 3 kills but 140 farm, one barely made it out alive and the other was not so lucky

dude. If you just e onto the annie, q and then w to run away, thats like.. pretty free damage honestly. If you dont know how to play ranged matchups, you just have to learn what they are doing to beat you, and what you can do to counter their plan to beat you in lane. You just gotta learn your matchups breh.
Yes but try farmign under turr where she throws a q every time you get one minion

There are a few ways to deal with cheeky top lane mages,

Switch with your mid laner: They should be better equipped to deal with mage then you are. If both lanes have mages this is still a decent plan since mid lane is a shorter lane and you'll be closer to your turret then you would top lane. 

Pick {{champion:3}}, {{champion:31}}  or {{champion:74}}: These guys are flexible top/mid laners that do well against most mages that dare to go top.

Pick a tanky top like{{champion:106}}, {{champion:57}}  or {{champion:111}} : These guys won't necessarily dominate lane, but their kits let them transition to teamfights pretty well even without items. Just avoid feeding.

This was norms btw so i couldn't really predict or counterpick. I'm just saying in general people liek annie and ahri are very frustrating to deal with in top lane and jsut the sight of them was revolting at a certain point
Litterally any bruiser will crush them and any tank will shrug off most of their dmg after the first back and all of it after the second.
Easy solution, play a bruiser with a gap closer {{champion:39}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:157}}
